name: Transifex Black
description: Ever wanted a black theme for your top-notch OLED display? This theme gives you the ability to change Transifex's theme with a total black one. If there is anything darker than this theme, that might be my soul.
additional_info:
Revision 18.06.30 - Darker than before, as I am unable to change the colors of the 'Translation Stats Graph' I've decided to change some colors to defaults in order to eliminate confusion. Yet there still might be confusion as I didn't entirely restore all colors.

Darkest blue (#113): Reviewed
Dark blue (#33A): Translated
Gray: Well... it is void

This theme only tested on Firefox, with uBlock activated.

I have checked every single page I could see, and I tried my best to darken them.

Transifex help center (docs.transifex.com) may not be completely black, as mentioned in code it is a low effort section.

Rarely, some parts of the screen goes white, that's might be caused by bad coding or bad handling. Refreshing the page is enough to fix this.
